About me
Hello, my name is Dalton Oswald and I am learning web development. I graudated from California University of Pennsylvania in 2019 with a degree in Communicaiton with a concentration in Radio/TV. In my free time I enjoy playing Oldschool Runescape, which you can see as the basis for many of my projects.
